uk.co.silentsoftware.dispatcher

Class WorkProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.silentsoftware.dispatcher.WorkProcessor

  • public class WorkProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class for a work processing unit that contains conversion actioning methods (i.e. the bits that actually call the bits that do work :) ). This class is not entirely static due to the need for separate instances when used by the many dithers preview requiring a different image processor each time.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorkProcessor()
      Main work processor constructor used for actual results
      WorkProcessor(DitherStrategy dither)
      Preview constructor for when we need a result from a given dither strategy as opposed to that selected in options

      (package private) byte[] convertScreen(java.awt.image.BufferedImage original)
      Converts the given image to the SCR (SCREEN) format, optionally saves the file to disk and wraps any errors during conversion and shows them as a UI dialog message.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage preProcessImage(java.awt.Image original, ScalingObject scaling)
      Pre processes the given bufferedimage applying the given scaling and the specified option set contrast, saturation and brightness
